user.title: Spring Input Boolean Setup
user.description:
Choose how to set up Spring Input Boolean devices:

{info}

manual.title: Manual Setup
manual.description:
Enter the entity ID of the input_boolean you want to configure.

Available entities: {available_entities}

confirm_discovery.title: Add Spring Behavior to {name}?
confirm_discovery.description:
Do you want to add spring behavior to '{name}' ({entity_id})?

This will make the input boolean automatically reverse its state after a configurable delay.

config.title: Configure Spring Behavior for {name}
config.description: Configure how '{name}' ({entity_id}) should behave when its state changes.

data.delay_seconds: Delay before reversing state (0-300 seconds, default: 30)
data.phone_entity_ids: Phone entity IDs (comma-separated, e.g., mobile_app_john_phone, mobile_app_jane_phone)
data.custom_service_name: Custom notification service name (e.g., telegram_bot, my_custom_notifier)

error.custom_service_required: Custom service name is required when 'Custom notification service' is selected
error.no_input_booleans: No input_boolean entities found in your system
error.entity_not_found: This input_boolean entity does not exist in your system
error.already_configured: This input_boolean is already configured for spring behavior

abort.use_discovery: This integration uses automatic discovery. Look for discovered Spring Input Boolean devices in the 'Discovered' section below.
